span.p: Wilton-Lyndeborough Cooperative School District provides a safe and educational environment that promotes student exploration, critical thinking, and responsible citizenship.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

h2.span: Welcome to Wilton-Lyndeborough Cooperative School District-SAU #63

span.em: Proudly serving the communities of Wilton and Lyndeborough.

p.span: Wilton-Lyndeborough Cooperative School District provides a safe and educational environment that promotes student exploration, critical thinking, and responsible citizenship.

span.u: Emergency Public Hearing and School Board Meeting Tuesday, May 5 6:30PM at LCS.

p.span: Will hold a Public Hearing to accept and expend unanticipated
revenue from state, federal and other sources per
RSA 198:20-b on May 5, 6:30 p.m. at Lyndeborough Central School,

span.em: DISTANCE LEARNING FOR STUDENTS STARTING MONDAY MARCH 16 through the end of this school year.

p.span: Distance Learning and Food Service Information-see tab above
District meeting/election information- see tab above, plus additional Budget Information under "School Board/Budget Information".

span.span: Nashua Adult Learning Center-School Age Adventures

p.span: Need additional information? Visit the website at www.adultlearningcenter.org or call 882-9080 x 2212

a.title: Nashua Adult Learning Center-School Age Adventures Brochure

span.a: Nashua Adult Learning Center-School Age Adventures Brochure-Click here

a.title: School Age Adventures Enrollment Packet

li.a: Budget Reductions/Spring Break/Last Day of School-April 23, 2020
Distance Learning Extends Through School Year-April 16
Call into School if Your Child is Sick During Distance Learning

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Lyndeborough Central School

p.span: UPDATE-Registration for incoming kindergarten students has been rescheduled to May 13 as curbside drop off from 6PM-8PM.
Completed packets can be dropped off, mailed or emailed tos.leblanc@sau63.org at Lyndeborough Central School.
Students eligible for kindergarten this fall must be 5 years old by September 30, 2020.
Please call Lyndeborough Central School at 603-732-9228 with any questions.

a.title: Registration Forms

span.a: Click here to obtain registration forms

p.span: In addition to the completed registration forms the following required documents will be needed for registration.

li.span: Original Birth Certificate (a copy of the original will be made for school records)
Two Proofs of Residency (Utility bill, Lease, Property tax Bill etc.)
Updated Physical Exam and Immunization Records

li.a: District Meeting PowerPoint Warrant Article 4-Operating Budget

div.div: The Wilton-Lyndeborough Cooperative School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, handicap, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or marital status in its administration of education programs activities or employment practice.
